se.ltu.android.demo.scene.intersection
Class PickResult

java.lang.Object
  se.ltu.android.demo.scene.intersection.PickResult

public class PickResult
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the result from testing ray intersections against a scenes elements.

Note:Currently it only holds the closest intersecting spatial since there was no need for more at the time.
